additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email with a large green block covering the main content. The email is from an unknown sender at the Department of Justice to Hugh Hurwitz at the Bureau of Prisons, regarding a draft document. The email was sent on August 13, 2019, at 13:00:47 UTC and received at 8:55 pm on the same day.
